executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Run python tests using ONLY verify_user.ts logic equivalents (stateless requests).
Target: http://localhost:3000/api/test-debug

1. Login Success: POST /api/test-debug?action=login (correct creds).
2. Login Fail: POST /api/test-debug?action=login (wrong pwd).
3. Inventory: POST /api/test-debug?action=check_inventory.
4. Customer: POST /api/test-debug?action=create_customer (random email).

Do NOT use 'supabase' package. Use 'requests'.
